effect_entries.effect:
Held: Raises the holder’s critical hit counter by 1.
Held by Sneasel: Evolves the holder into Weavile when it levels up during the night.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Raises the holder’s critical hit ratio by one stage. Held by a Sneasel while levelling up at night: Holder evolves into Weavile.

flavor_text_entries.text: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a sharply hooked claw that ups the holder’s critical-hit ratio.
